name: Third Wave Coffee
description: A specialty coffee roaster serving single-origin coffees, artisanal brews, and freshly baked pastries in a contemporary setting with fast Wi-Fi for remote workers.

name: Blossoms Book House
description: A beloved multi-story bookstore with an extensive collection of new, used, and rare books across genres. A paradise for book lovers with great deals on second-hand books.
address: Church Street, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bangalore

name: Varnam Craft Collective
description: A sustainable craft studio showcasing traditional Indian craftsmanship with contemporary designs. Features handmade pottery, textiles, and home decor items made by local artisans.

name: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
description: A historic botanical garden with diverse plant species, a glasshouse, and a lake. Famous for its bi-annual flower shows and home to centuries-old trees and rare plant collections from around the world.

name: Cinnamon
description: A premium boutique featuring contemporary Indian designer wear, handloom textiles, and accessories. Known for supporting traditional crafts with modern aesthetics.

name: Bangalore Tech Hub
description: A modern tech store and repair center offering the latest gadgets, custom PC builds, and expert tech support. Features a dedicated gaming zone and regular tech workshops.

name: Namdhari's Fresh
description: An organic grocery store offering farm-fresh produce, organic dairy, and health foods. Known for its high-quality fruits, vegetables, and commitment to sustainable farming practices.

name: Toit Brewpub
description: A popular microbrewery and restaurant serving craft beers and global cuisine. Known for its lively atmosphere, live music events, and house-brewed craft beers.

name: Cubbon Park
description: A historic public park and lung space of Bangalore with lush greenery, walking paths, and recreational areas. Perfect for morning jogs, picnics, and weekend relaxation.

name: The Yoga Studio
description: A serene yoga studio offering various styles of yoga classes for all levels. Features experienced instructors, meditation sessions, and wellness workshops in a peaceful environment.

name: Bangalore Pets & Co
description: A comprehensive pet store offering premium pet food, accessories, grooming services, and adoption assistance. Known for its knowledgeable staff and wide range of pet supplies.

name: National Gallery of Modern Art
description: A premier art gallery housed in a colonial mansion showcasing Indian modern art from the 1850s onwards. Features paintings, sculptures, and regular exhibitions by renowned artists.

name: Mavalli Tiffin Room (MTR)
description: An iconic South Indian restaurant established in 1924, famous for its authentic Karnataka cuisine, especially dosas, idlis, and filter coffee. Known for maintaining traditional recipes and cooking methods.

name: UB City Mall
description: Bangalore's luxury shopping destination featuring high-end international brands, fine dining restaurants, and a rooftop bar with panoramic city views. The mall is known for its upscale ambiance and premium shopping experience.

name: Wonderla Amusement Park
description: One of India's largest amusement parks featuring thrilling rides, water attractions, and entertainment shows. Perfect for family outings with attractions suitable for all age groups.

name: The Humming Tree
description: A vibrant live music venue and cultural space hosting local and international artists. Features an intimate performance area, craft cocktails, and a curated food menu.

name: Bangalore Climbing Initiatives
description: A state-of-the-art indoor climbing facility offering bouldering, top rope climbing, and lead climbing. Includes training programs, equipment rental, and a supportive climbing community.

name: The Pottery Studio
description: A creative space offering pottery classes, ceramic workshops, and studio time for both beginners and experienced artists. Features wheel throwing, hand building, and glazing facilities.

name: Green Theory
description: A charming vegetarian cafe set in a heritage bungalow with a beautiful garden setting. Serves organic, farm-to-table dishes with global influences and specialty teas.

name: The Record Room
description: A vintage vinyl record store and listening room offering a curated collection of classic and contemporary albums. Features listening stations, rare finds, and regular vinyl-only DJ nights.

name: Little Italy
description: A cozy Italian restaurant famous for its authentic pizzas and pasta. Known for its warm atmosphere and vegetarian options.

name: Koshy's
description: An iconic Bangalore eatery known for its traditional South Indian breakfast and a diverse menu. A gathering place for locals and tourists alike.

name: Café Coffee Day
description: A well-known coffeehouse chain offering a variety of brews and snacks, perfect for casual meetings or a relaxed cup of coffee.

name: Indiranagar 100 Feet Road
description: A vibrant shopping street known for its boutiques, cafes, and lifestyle stores. A popular destination for both shopping and dining.

name: Bannerghatta National Park
description: A national park featuring a variety of flora and fauna, including a safari experience. A great spot for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts.

name: The Hosa Road
description: A quaint café known for its artisanal coffee and healthy brunch options. Offers a cozy environment perfect for casual meetups.

name: Bangalore Palace
description: A magnificent palace built in Tudor-Gothic style, featuring beautiful gardens, courtyards, and a collection of historical artifacts and artwork.

name: Visvesvaraya Industrial & Technological Museum
description: An interactive science museum with exhibits on engines, electricity, space, biotechnology, and more. Perfect for educational family outings.

name: Ulsoor Lake
description: A serene lake in the heart of the city offering boating facilities and walking paths. A peaceful retreat from urban hustle.

name: Innovative Film City
description: A theme park and entertainment complex featuring various attractions, including a wax museum, dinosaur world, and mini golf.

name: Janapada Loka
description: A folk arts museum showcasing the rural culture and traditions of Karnataka through artifacts, folk art, and performances.

name: Nandi Hills
description: A scenic hill station offering breathtaking views, ancient temples, and hiking trails. Famous for its sunrise views and pleasant climate.

name: Phoenix Marketcity
description: A premium shopping mall featuring international brands, entertainment options, and a variety of dining experiences.

name: Orion Mall
description: A modern shopping destination with a mix of retail, dining, and entertainment options. Features a large multiplex and gaming zone.

name: Mantri Square Mall
description: One of Bangalore's largest shopping malls with a wide range of retail outlets, food options, and entertainment facilities.

name: Garuda Mall
description: A centrally located mall offering a mix of international and local brands, along with entertainment and dining options.

name: Forum Mall
description: One of the first modern shopping malls in Bangalore, offering a premium shopping experience with top brands and entertainment options.

name: Iskcon Temple
description: A beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Krishna, known for its spiritual ambiance, cultural programs, and prasadam (sacred food).

name: Bull Temple
description: An ancient temple dedicated to Nandi (the bull), featuring one of the largest monolithic bull statues in the world.

name: St. Mary's Basilica
description: The oldest church in Bangalore, known for its Gothic architecture and the annual St. Mary's Feast celebration.

name: HAL Aerospace Museum
description: India's first aerospace museum showcasing the growth of the Indian aviation industry and HAL's contributions to it.

name: Jawaharlal Nehru Planetarium
description: A popular science center featuring astronomical shows, interactive exhibits, and educational programs about space and astronomy.
address: Sri T. Chowdaiah Road, High Grounds, Bangalore

name: Bangalore Aquarium
description: One of India's largest freshwater aquariums, housing a variety of fish species and aquatic plants.

name: Tipu Sultan's Summer Palace
description: A historic palace showcasing Indo-Islamic architecture, built as a summer residence for Tipu Sultan, the ruler of Mysore.

name: Bangalore Fort
description: A historic fort built by Kempe Gowda I, the founder of Bangalore, later expanded by Tipu Sultan. Features mud walls, gates, and a temple.

name: Chunchi Falls
description: A picturesque waterfall located on the Arkavati River, offering stunning views and trekking opportunities.

name: Savandurga Hills
description: One of the largest monolith hills in Asia, offering challenging trekking routes and panoramic views of the surrounding landscape.

name: Thottikallu Falls
description: Also known as TG Halli Falls, this scenic waterfall is a popular weekend getaway offering natural beauty and trekking opportunities.

name: Devanahalli Fort
description: A historic fort near Bangalore International Airport, known as the birthplace of Tipu Sultan and featuring impressive architecture.

name: Grover Zampa Vineyards
description: A premium winery offering vineyard tours, wine tasting sessions, and insights into the wine-making process.

name: Manyata Tech Park
description: One of Bangalore's largest tech parks, housing numerous multinational companies and offering modern office spaces and amenities.

name: Electronic City
description: A major technology hub housing numerous IT companies and startups, with modern infrastructure and amenities.

name: Whitefield
description: A major IT hub and residential area in eastern Bangalore, featuring tech parks, shopping malls, and residential communities.

name: Lumbini Gardens
description: A lakeside park featuring boating, water sports, children's play areas, and a wave pool, perfect for family outings.

name: Fun World
description: An amusement park offering various rides, water attractions, and entertainment options for all age groups.

name: Snow City
description: An indoor snow theme park offering a unique snow experience in tropical Bangalore, with activities like sledding and snow games.

name: Bangalore Turf Club
description: A premier horse racing venue hosting regular race events and offering betting facilities in a historic setting.

name: M. Chinnaswamy Stadium
description: A renowned cricket stadium hosting international and domestic matches, with a capacity of around 40,000 spectators.
hours: Match Days: As per schedule, Non-Match Days: 10AM-5PM (Museum only)

name: Kanteerava Stadium
description: A multi-purpose stadium hosting various sports events including football, athletics, and basketball competitions.
hours: Event Days: As per schedule, Non-Event Days: 6AM-9AM, 4PM-8PM

name: Ranga Shankara
description: A renowned theatre venue dedicated to promoting quality theatre, hosting performances in multiple languages and conducting workshops.
hours: Performance Days: As per schedule, Café: 9:30AM-8:30PM

name: Chowdiah Memorial Hall
description: A unique violin-shaped auditorium hosting music concerts, dance performances, and cultural events in a distinctive setting.
hours: Event Days: As per schedule, Office: 10AM-6PM

name: Ravindra Kalakshetra
description: A cultural center hosting various performing arts events, including classical music, dance, and theatre performances.
hours: Event Days: As per schedule, Office: 10AM-5:30PM

name: Bangalore International Centre
description: A vibrant cultural space hosting lectures, panel discussions, art exhibitions, film screenings, and music performances.

name: Bangalore Literature Festival
description: An annual literary festival bringing together authors, readers, and publishers for book launches, panel discussions, and literary events.

name: Bangalore International Film Festival
description: An annual film festival showcasing international and Indian cinema, with screenings, workshops, and interactions with filmmakers.
